segments.text: Are you OK ? I didn't mean to put you in danger .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm the hazardous one here . I made three people fall over !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm so humiliated ! What's that man saying ? Everyone's laughing !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He said you obviously prefer Greek comedies to Greek tragedies .
segments.speaker: S2
